alert.note: Alert for Hot Spring (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 4:18PM CDT until March 31 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL GRANT AND EASTERN HOT SPRING COUNTIES... At 417 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 7 miles northeast of Caddo Valley, or 10 miles northeast of Arkadelphia, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Malvern... Rockport... Poyen... Perla... Jenkins Ferry State Park... Thiel... Donaldson... Friendship... Magnet Cove... Social Hill... Gifford... Midway in Hot Spring County... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
